name: Wizards Quest - Adventure in the Kingdom
name_original: Wizards Quest - Adventure in the Kingdom
description:
A faraway kingdom is shaken to its foundations when the prince is accidentally turned into a dragon. It's up to you to rebuild the city and restore it to its former glory!

Restore the entire city to its former glory! Reverse the transformation of the prince and make sure that the kingdom is restored until the wedding of the princess. Overcome all obstacles, use power-ups and solve mini-games and extra levels!

Features:

- Varied match 3 game with many levels
- Restore an entire kingdom
- Win various power ups, upgrades, trophies and extras
- Solve exciting extra levels, puzzles and bonus games
